articles.description: A rival, Canadian National Railway, drops its pursuit, bringing to a close a monthslong battle for the coveted company
articles.content:
Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd. clinched a deal to take over Kansas City Southern , as a rival dropped its pursuit of the highly coveted railroad after a monthslong battle.
The $27 billion agreement, … [+178 chars]
